full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP) - Model Validation Consulting

#### Request Header
* **Title (English):** REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL - MODEL VALIDATION CONSULTING
* **Title (French):** DEMANDE DE PROPOSITIONS — SERVICES D’EXPERTS-CONSEILS POUR LA VALIDATION DE MODÈLLES
* **Reference Number:** MX-42818915990
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** PS23-DB-004
* **Publication Date:** 2023-07-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-08T16:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-09-08
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status (English):** Expired
* **Tender Status (French):** Expiré

#### Description
Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is a leading agriculture and food lender in Canada, dedicated to the industry that feeds the world. Our Model Validation Consulting Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks a qualified consultant to provide expert advice to our internal model validation team, supporting the validation of our approximately 150 models.

#### RFP Particulars
* **Duration of Contract:** Three (3) years
* **Options:** One (1) year option
* **Estimated Quantity of Goods or Services:** Please refer to the RFP for further details
* **Timeframe of Delivery of Goods or Services:** Not applicable

#### RFP Schedule
* **RFP Release Date:** July 25, 2023
* **Proponent Questions Accepted Until:** August 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM CST
* **FCC Response to Proponent Questions Delivered Before:** August 28, 2023 at 5:00 PM CST
* **RFP Closing Date/Time:** September 8, 2023, at 2:00 PM CST

#### Priority of Documents
In the event of discrepancies between the present RFP and the information on the MERX website, the present RFP shall take precedence. Bidding and documents are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.
